body_html: Yes, the fix is in 1.7. After some changes inTF 1.6, cifar10 was about 8x slower than TF 1.5. After the fix, TF 1.7 is now about 12% slower. The fix in TF 1.7 was temporary, it will be improved in the future versions.

body: Yes, the fix is in 1.7. After some changes inTF 1.6, cifar10 was about 8x slower than TF 1.5. After the fix, TF 1.7 is now about 12% slower. The fix in TF 1.7 was temporary, it will be improved in the future versions.
